DOC.brief_summary: The study is a prospective, randomized, double-blind sham-controlled study.
DOC.detailed_description: The principal objective of this trial is to investigate the effect of left prefrontal high frequency rTMS on negative symptoms in schizophrenia.
DOC.criteria: DSMIV criteria for schizophrenia age between 18 and 60 informed consent right handed patient no change of antipsychotic treatment > 2 weeks before recruitment seizures, epilepsy history of severe head injury status post implantation of a cardiac pacemaker or other electronic devises
